subSubSection.paragraph: Sunda islands as far east as Sumba, Sulawesi.
The species is occupies stagnant water habitats with emergent vegetation or pools on rocky / gravelly ground at the edge of streams and creeks, sometimes also roadside pools (Figs 19, 20).
